name: Butter Chicken Puzzle
description:
Welcome to "Butter Chicken" where you have to solve puzzles with help of speed and jump platforms which boost your jump and speed, but there is an unintentional side-effect that double your size. By eating the Butter Chicken which can be found in each level, you half your size and return to your normal mobility options. 

Controls:

  • A and D to move
  • Space to jump
  • E to pick up the Butter Chicken
  • Whilst carrying the Butter Chicken E to eat and Left Click to throw
  • Press Q whilst standing on the platforms to obtain the power up
  • R to restart

Submitted for the #25 Jame Gam.

Hope you enjoy my game.
